item.title: Dull elves
item.description: I’m going to reference this sooner or later, so I want the full citation. In a letter to her sister Cassandra, circa the publication of [[books/pride and prejudice|Pride and Prejudice]], [[authors/jane austen|Jane Austen]] said the following about printer’s errors she’d found in the text: “There are a few Typical errors—& a ‘said he’ or a ‘said she’ would sometimes make the Dialogue more immediately clear.
